title: Congressional Oversight Obstruction Campaign
description: Documentation of systematic efforts to obstruct congressional oversight through privilege claims and stonewalling. Identified 381 pattern instances showing coordinated obstruction of legislative branch oversight functions.
research_questions: What are the specific mechanisms used for congressional obstruction?
Who are the key actors coordinating oversight obstruction efforts?
What timeline evidence exists for systematic stonewalling operations?
Which congressional investigations show evidence of coordinated obstruction?
How do obstruction efforts connect to broader separation of powers violations?
source_analysis: Trump Tyranny Tracker Batch 1 Analysis - 381 congressional obstruction patterns identified across 45 articles
